alert.note: Alert for Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 19 at 4:39PM EST until January 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EST FOR NORTHEASTERN WARREN...NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...NORTHERN CLINTON... SOUTHEASTERN CLARK...GREENE AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 439 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Xenia, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Beavercreek, Fairborn, Xenia, Wilmington, Bellbrook, Yellow Springs, Cedarville, Waynesville, Sabina, Jamestown, South Charleston, Jeffersonville, Wilberforce, Lisbon, New Jasper, Brighton, Clarksville, Harveysburg, Spring Valley and Corwin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
